posts.post_content:
Prices include insured shipping.  Paypal, check, MO, pennies all allowed.  Please email me questions at [url]tiger8mush@yahoo.com[/url].
Thanks!
Rob
:)

Johnston - $245  (very clean, paperloss on back, strong image, slight angle cut on right side)


Geiss - $125 (nice image though sorta light, either paperloss or extra paper at bottom left, paper loss and extra paper on back, mostly clean overall) SOLD!
Fogarty - $155 (strong image, slight angle cut on left side, no paperloss, some sorta soil on left side that is more visible on back) SOLD!
Irwin - $175 (paperloss on back, pretty nice image) SOLD!
Flanigan - $205 (very nice shape with a slight angle cut on right side, making top slightly skinnier than bottom.  back is clean with just a small amount of paper loss on bottom left edge)SOLD!

PM sent on Irwin.
Thanks Rob.
bump for prices reduced on 3 remaining

just a friendly bump, a couple of old judges left.

thanks,
Rob
:)
